item.title: US Steel to resume production at Illinois plant shut 3 years ago
item.description: U.S. Steel says it'll resume making steel slabs at its Granite City Works plant in Illinois amid strengthening demand

item.title: US consumer sentiment improved this month but remains subdued
item.description: U.S. consumers’ mood improved slightly this month, with worries about inflation easing a bit, but remains gloomy

item.title: French first lady Brigitte Macron visits an old friend in China: A giant panda called Yuan Meng
item.description: French first lady Brigitte Macron has reunited with a giant panda born in France during a visit to China with President Emmanuel Macron
